Reference

Colors and color palettes

The colors and color palettes exported by unikn.

Bordeaux

uni.kn color Bordeaux

Karpfenblau

uni.kn color Karpfenblau

Grau

uni.kn color Grau

Peach

uni.kn color Peach

Petrol

uni.kn color Petrol

Pinky

uni.kn color Pinky

Seeblau

uni.kn color Seeblau

Seegruen

uni.kn color Seegruen

Signal

uni.kn color Signal or alert

pal_bordeaux

uni.kn color palette bordeaux

pal_grau

uni.kn color palette grau

pal_karpfenblau

uni.kn color palette karpfenblau

pal_peach

uni.kn color palette peach

pal_petrol

uni.kn color palette petrol

pal_pinky

uni.kn color palette pinky

pal_seeblau

uni.kn color palette seeblau

pal_seegruen

uni.kn color palette seegruen

pal_signal

uni.kn color palette signal (Ampel colors)

pal_unikn

uni.kn default color palette (11 colors)

pal_unikn_dark

uni.kn color palette of dark colors (10 colors)

pal_unikn_light

uni.kn color palette of light colors (10 colors)

pal_unikn_pair

uni.kn color palette of pairwise colors (16 colors)

pal_unikn_ppt

uni.kn secondary color palette (ppt version)

pal_unikn_pref

uni.kn color palette of preferred colors (9 colors)

pal_unikn_web

uni.kn default color palette (web version)

caltech_pal_1

Primary and neutral colors of Caltech

caltech_pal_2

Primary and deep colors of Caltech

caltech_pal_3

Primary and bright colors of Caltech

eth_pal

Default colors of the ETH Zurich

eth_pal_grey

Black and grey colors of the ETH Zurich

eth_pal_light

Lighter shades of the ETH Zurich colors

hu_pal_1

Primary colors of the Humboldt University Berlin

hu_pal_2

Secondary colors of the Humboldt University Berlin

mpg_pal

Default colors of the Max-Planck-Gesellschaft

uni_freiburg_blue

Blue colors of the University of Freiburg

uni_freiburg_br

Default colors of the University of Freiburg

uni_freiburg_grey

Grey colors of the University of Freiburg

uni_freiburg_info

Info colors of the University of Freiburg

uni_goettingen_1

Primary colors of the University of GÃ¶ttingen

uni_goettingen_2

Secondary colors of the University of GÃ¶ttingen

uni_goettingen_3

Departmental colors of the University of GÃ¶ttingen

uni_konstanz

Default colors of the University of Konstanz

uni_konstanz_pref

Preferred colors of the University of Konstanz

uni_princeton_0

Basic colors of Princeton University

uni_princeton_1

Colors of Princeton University (on white backgrounds)

uni_princeton_2

Colors of Princeton University (on black backgrounds)

uni_regensburg_1

General colors of the University of Regensburg

uni_regensburg_2

Departmental colors of the University of Regensburg (for areas)

uni_regensburg_3

Departmental colors of the University of Regensburg (for fonts)

Color manipulation functions

Commands for viewing, creating, changing, finding and using colors and color palettes.

seecol()

Plot color palettes (to see their colors)

usecol()

Use a color or color palette

simcol()

Find similar colors

grepal()

Get a vector of colors whose names match a regular expression

newpal()

Define a new color palette

demopal()

Demonstrate a color palette (in a plot)

shades_of()

Get n shades of a color

ac()

Adjust color transparency

Plotting functions

Functions for plotting objects and themes.

slide()

Plot a slide (or frame)

xbox()

Plot a box (with x)

theme_grau()

Alternative theme (for ggplot2)

theme_unikn()

Basic unikn theme (for ggplot2)

Text decoration functions

Functions for decorating plotted text.

heading()

Plot a heading (as marked text elements)

mark()

Plot marked (or highlighted) text elements

post()

Post text (in an xbox)

uline()

Plot underlined text elements

url_unikn()

url_unikn formats an URL the uni.kn way

Miscellaneous

Other utility functions.

unikn.guide()

Open the unikn package guides

Contents
